scenario_text.value:
*huff* huff*... Okay, I don’t think they’re
following me.
(I made it back to the shrine somehow...)
(No one’s here? Not a single person...)
Heyyy, Minoru! Aoi?!
Is anybody heeere?!
(No responses... Where the heck did they...?)

(Oh, maybe I can get one of them on the
phone! I’ll call Minoru...)

...No service here?! Damn, my phone is
useless.
Wha—did something move just now?!

Oh man, something’s in here! Is it that rock
monster again?!

The sound...disappeared? Doesn’t look like
it’s trying to jump me, whatever it is...
(What should I do about that rock thing?)
Carefully move closer.
Jump at it!

Not knowing what’s coming this way freaks me
out... I’ll try moving closer.
I’ll do my best not to set this thing off...

I’ll just jump right at it! Maybe I can beat
whatever it is if I take it by surprise.
Ready...aaand...
Hyaaah!
Huh? It’s gone?! Where in the world...?

...Hey, some of the grass is moving over
there. Like something’s in there.

I can’t see anything, but something’s
there...isn’t there?
Hmm, this reminds me of the last time...
(All right, then... What to do?)
Go right on up to it!
Keep calm and wait...
What did Minoru say?

I can’t see it, but I know it’s there. Maybe
I’ll know what it is if I touch it?

I’m a little scared, but I’ve just gotta
check it out.
Careful, now...
Huh? Nothing’s here?

Wait, some tracks were left in the grass
here. Did it run when I got close?

Hmm, is there a way to check it out without
getting close?
I could just see it, all of a sudden...
Maybe I should wait and see what happens?

No good, I still can’t see a thing. I don’t
have time to just hang around here, anyway.

Hmm, last time I saw something I couldn’t see
before, I used...uh, what was it again?

Now that I think about it, I remember Minoru
saying something back then.

Something about “picking up weird stuff” with
his... Hmm...

What did he have on him? Something that can
capture things the naked eye can’t?

That’s right, Minoru picked up a presence with
his phone camera. Why don’t I take a picture?
Right, I’ll give it a shot.
Whoa! What the heck was that just now?!

It was just a moment, but I definitely saw
something. This will help me see it!

Still, I don’t know what I’ll do if something
attacks me again.

Nothing’ll come of just sitting here. I’ll
look around with my <color=#B41919>phone</color>, see what I find.
